00082 class BRISA_UPNP_EXPORT BrisaServiceFetcher: public QObject {
00083 Q_OBJECT
00084 
00085 public:
00093     BrisaServiceFetcher(BrisaControlPointService *service, QString location,
00094             QObject *parent = 0) :
00095         QObject(parent), location(location), service(service) {
00096         eventLoop = new QEventLoop();
00097         downloader = new QNetworkAccessManager();
00098 
00099         connect(this, SIGNAL(fetchFinished()), eventLoop, SLOT(quit()));
00100         connect(downloader, SIGNAL(finished(QNetworkReply*)), this,
00101                 SLOT(downloadFinished(QNetworkReply*)));
00102         service = NULL;
00103         error = false;
00104     }
00105 
00111     ~BrisaServiceFetcher() {
00112         delete downloader;
00113         delete eventLoop;
00114     }
00115 
00122     bool fetch(void) {
00123         downloader->get(QNetworkRequest(location));
00124         eventLoop->exec();
00125 
00126         return error;
00127     }
00128 
00129 private:
00135     QEventLoop *eventLoop;
00136 
00142     QNetworkAccessManager *downloader;
00143 
00149     QString location;
00150 
00156     BrisaControlPointService *service;
00157 
00163     bool error;
00164 
00165 signals:
00171     void fetchFinished(void);
00172 
00173 private slots:
00182     void downloadFinished(QNetworkReply *reply) {
00183         QTemporaryFile *scpd = new QTemporaryFile();
00184 
00185         if (!scpd->open()) {
00186             qDebug() << "Failed to open scpd file for writing";
00187             error = true;
00188             emit
00189             fetchFinished();
00190             return;
00191         }
00192 
00193         scpd->write(reply->readAll());
00194         scpd->seek(0);
00195         service->parseFromXml(scpd);
00196 
00197         scpd->remove();
00198         delete scpd;
00199         emit fetchFinished();
00200     }
00201 
00202 };
00203 
00204 }
